author: Stephen Pastor
text:
Ban comedians. Ban celebrities. Ban politicians. Ban religion. Ban everything that thinks it is more important than anything else on this earth.

Nothing is more important than what you need for yerself to be healthy & at peace.

Rant over. Good day. xo

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
I'm pro-choice.

If yer just finding this out due to this platform -- boy oh boy -- wait until you hear about my opinions on other important topics.

Everybody go take a fucking nap & hydrate. 🖤

author: Stephen Pastor
text: I already hate this tweet.

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
People change. Give chances. Forgive. Vent>complain. Enjoy things yer not good at. Listen don't wait to speak. Be patient. Make mistakes. Fix some. Ask for help. Love everything that you can. Don't listen to people tell you what to do like me if you don't want to but be kind.
xo

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
I am playing the part of a homeless man with a guitar outside of a corner store today for a film.

I have one line.

I'm gonna slay.

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
Here ya go, Hollywood. xo

author: Stephen Pastor
text: Ok today I swear. Sorry I'm pulling a Kendrick.

author: Stephen Pastor
text: By tomorrow, I meant today. Monday.

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
Dropping that happy new heat tomorrow; buckle up.

Lo-fi video again but proud of this one. Very "anthem-y".

author: Stephen Pastor
text: Well there you have it ladies & gentleman -- the next song will be happy thanks to all one (1) voters! 😆

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
Panic! at the Disco > Widespread Panic

Bring it.

author: Stephen Pastor
text: And be honest with yerself -- we all know which ones are better.

author: Stephen Pastor
text: The next song I post should be...

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
Delivery drivers love talking about where shit is.

You know where Smithtown road is?
Yeah right off of Baxter after the Walmart, right?
YEAH!!! I deliver to 806 Smithtown road third floor.
DUDE DO YOU KNOW CINDY?
YES I DELIVER HER PENCILS HOLY SHIT LETS MOUTH KISS NOW AHHHHHHH!!

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
This man is playing pool with one hand. Not to be cute. His other hand is disabled and he has a cane. He is absolutely destroying it. He is humble. 

Never give up.
xo

author: Stephen Pastor
text: It would be very funny if all of the Let's Go Brandon flags were manufactured by Democratic businesses and, therefore, all of the profits went to those aforementioned businesses.

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
Gonna put some more material out next week, pals.

Thanks for listening to my noise; you don't have to and it means a whole lot & stuff.

Also -- if yer reading this yer probably awesome & you should know that. Keep it up. Ask for help. Be safe. Don't judge.

#RIPTaylorHawkins

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
I haven't seen an artist sneeze or cough on stage into a mic & I've been thinking about this since I've been 14-years-old.

I have seen an artist vomit into the drummer's cinder block & continue the song, though.

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
Hi yins! Please help me be famous & check the YouTube link. Like and comment and all that b.s. Thank you so much for helping my silly little dreams come true. xo

#gemsintherough2022

https://t.co/MHAgDeeSW3 https://t.co/EgoDICQAIO

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
Putting out a lo-fi, live video tomorrow for a contest. Details to come. 

Tired of working & not being relatively famous.

Be kind. Love yins. xo

author: Stephen Pastor
text: "Haha I beat you to the punch!" - the man's last words in his cult

author: Stephen Pastor
text: PSA: Most delivery drivers DO enjoy small talk. Even if it's about the weather. Human interaction is very important. So yes -- I am staying warm & driving safe. Thank you. xo

author: Stephen Pastor
text: I wrote four, good songs this month, folks. And there are a few days left to at least start another. 📝

author: Stephen Pastor
text: If I ever meet a genie I'm just gonna ask how much of my husky's hair have I ingested since we got him. #nevernothairinmyfood #husky

text:

Just in case I ever have to spontaneously play guitar or go to @AldiUSA.

author: Stephen Pastor
text: She is starting it because, and I quote, "Biden is getting on her nerves." She also said that the band I've been listening to all day is pretty good; that band is the Clash. Be still, my heart. Xo @LauraJaneGrace

author: Stephen Pastor
text: My 74-year-old gram is starting yer book today, @LauraJaneGrace ; she'll have a book report done asap. Xo #PunkRock #Tranny #GrannyReadingTranny https://t.co/BhX5xEm3ML

author: Stephen Pastor
text: One of the best interactions I've heard in a long time was when my friend in a wheelchair said that other people bring him down because he's disabled & without missing a beat somebody else said that even though he was sitting down he was standing taller than all of those people.

author: Stephen Pastor
text: Do something kind today. Xo https://t.co/ZkQCTfwKmB

author: Stephen Pastor
text:
P.S. I suppose you can send them anytime and she'll just get a bunch each day. 

P.S.S. make sure you put a $5 in there so she can spend it on snacks at lunchtime in school. Xo
